about: Platform engineer with expertise in scaling analysis for distributed systems, audio programming, and human-computer interaction. Master's graduate from the University of Oslo focused on communications technology and its intersection with audio.
Interested in how technology can afford new perspectives in media and communications. Currently working as a platform engineer at nLine, evaluating improvements to the energy grid.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Lead engineer architecting and implementing scalable solutions for real-time monitoring of electrical grid reliability across Sub-Saharan Africa.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain infrastructure for real-time data monitoring, processing massive, real-time datasets from thousands of sensors in Spark
Design and implement custom Grafana plugins and programmatically deploy dashboards across multiple country deployments using Terraform
Architect a comprehensive library for distributed data processing and analysis in PySpark, enabling scalable ingestion, processing, and visualization of grid reliability data
Co-design and maintain company blog and website with modern web development frameworks

experience.title: Graduate Researcher
experience.description: Led software development for various academic projects.
responsibilities: Developed Python analysis toolkit for academic journal metadata extraction and analysis
Assisted in archival and analysis of musical composition recordings
Built React website for music technology guides and resources
Maintained official blog for master's program

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Involved in retrieval and analysis of corporate and lead data, and improving in-house software.
responsibilities: Retrieved, compiled, and enriched corporate data for clients' marketing teams
Built Python functions for batch data enrichment
Designed UI for programs, product forms, and marketing material
Assisted in implementing marketing strategies for seed-round funding campaign

projects.name: Cacophony
projects.description: Developed an immersive sound installation for Sound Pedro 2024, exploring the overwhelming nature of consumptive media platforms. Created a real-time, multi-channel audio system that streams in random clips from YouTube videos in real-time.

projects.name: Meet in Space
projects.description: A deployment of binaural, spatial audio in Jitsi Meet, an enterprise-level conferencing platform. My master's thesis project for MCT at the University of Oslo.

projects.name: Soniweb
projects.description: Sonification of web packet origins in real-time through Pure Data and Python

projects.name: NIME Proceedings Analyzer
projects.description: A toolkit for bibliometric meta-data extraction and text analysis over 20 years of an academic journal
